The impression pour type IV dental stone order obtain master cast . The master cast survey . The proposed design follow : metal framework base saddle edentulous area side connect palatal strap . Aker 's clasp abutment buccal retention . The denture base try acrylic teeth patient 's mouth . DOC.criteria: All patient must Kennedy class III modification I upper partially edentulous ridge . The remain teeth good periodontal condition , sign attrition gingival recession . Male female patient age range ( 4555 ) good medical condition All patient skeletal Angle 's class I maxillomandibular relationship sufficient interarch distance . Free systemic neuromuscular disorder might affect chew efficiency masticatory muscle . Free tempromandibular joint disorder . The patient good oral hygiene low caries index .
